data.title: Flexible K12 Learning: Widefield School District 3
data.meta_description: Home - Widefield School District 3 | PreK-12 Public School District in Colorado Springs, CO | 1820 Main Street Colorado Springs, CO 80911 | Experience WSD3!
data.text: Widefield School District 3 (WSD3) is a vibrant community tucked away in the southeast side of Colorado Springs. We're a small town in a big city! WSD3 provides opportunities for all students to help them achieve their goals and set them up for success.
